text: 8.14: Zo 5.31-32; 7.28-29; 9.29Zisas mben kameŋ ŋgarkarav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Ne guigira, gu won tɨvara bun nzuai. Gu wo bun nzuai buni, nta guigi guarira. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, gu wo kegap zergi ŋgu, gu ana kaŋgi, gu vhɨra wo naanga ŋgu, gu ana kaŋgi. Nde nan ŋgu nɨɨŋge kaŋgi fhuvara. Gu mba ndai ŋaneŋ, nde vhɨra ne kaŋgi fhuvara.
